title: Chainium Price Reaches $0.0462 on Exchanges (CHX)
content: Chainium (CURRENCY:CHX) traded 6.2% higher against the US dollar during the 24 hour period ending at 17:00 PM E.T. on June 2nd. Chainium has a total market capitalization of $2.65 million and approximately $26,940.00 worth of Chainium was traded on exchanges in the last 24 hours. During the last seven days, Chainium has traded 6.9% lower against the US dollar. One Chainium token can now be purchased for approximately $0.0462 or 0.00000605 BTC on popular cryptocurrency exchanges including IDEX and Bancor Network.    Here is how similar cryptocurrencies have performed during the last 24 hours:    Ripple (XRP) traded up 4.3% against the dollar and now trades at $0.64 or 0.00008407 BTC.  Stellar (XLM) traded 4.2% higher against the dollar and now trades at $0.30 or 0.00003914 BTC.  IOTA (MIOTA) traded up 0.9% against the dollar and now trades at $1.89 or 0.00024749 BTC.  TRON (TRX) traded 5.3% higher against the dollar and now trades at $0.0610 or 0.00000799 BTC.  NEO (NEO) traded 3.8% higher against the dollar and now trades at $56.56 or 0.00740923 BTC.  Tether (USDT) traded 1.1% lower against the dollar and now trades at $0.99 or 0.00012957 BTC.  VeChain (VEN) traded 9.5% higher against the dollar and now trades at $3.72 or 0.00048676 BTC.  Binance Coin (BNB) traded up 4.8% against the dollar and now trades at $14.71 or 0.00192636 BTC.  Ontology (ONT) traded 10.4% higher against the dollar and now trades at $7.77 or 0.00101838 BTC.  Zilliqa (ZIL) traded up 7.7% against the dollar and now trades at $0.12 or 0.00001554 BTC.   About Chainium    Chainium’s total supply is 168,956,522 tokens and its circulating supply is 57,356,113 tokens. The Reddit community for Chainium is /r/chainium and the currency’s Github account can be viewed here . Chainium’s official Twitter account is @ChainiumIO and its Facebook page is accessible here . Chainium’s official message board is medium.com/@chainium . The official website for Chainium is chainium.io .  Buying and Selling Chainium    Chainium can be bought or sold on these cryptocurrency exchanges: IDEX and Bancor Network. It is usually not currently possible to purchase alternative cryptocurrencies such as Chainium directly using U.S. dollars. Investors seeking to trade Chainium should first purchase Ethereum or Bitcoin using an exchange that deals in U.S. dollars such as Changelly, Gemini or Coinbase . Investors can then use their newly-acquired Ethereum or Bitcoin to purchase Chainium using one of the aforementioned exchanges.
